alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:50AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gilchrist, northwestern Alachua, southwestern Union, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 949 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Obrien to 6 miles south of High Springs. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, Alachua, High Springs, Fort White, Upland Pines, Branford, La Crosse and Hildreth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Union; Western Alachua
